outcome: Halden's diaries reveal a heroic self-sacrifice aiming to inspire societal awakening.

events.description: A mysterious package containing Halden's personal diaries is delivered to the Council's headquarters.
Select excerpts from Halden's diaries, revealing his self-sacrifice intent, are leaked to media outlets.
Public discussion forums teem with debates on Halden's true intentions, with citizens divided on his legacy.
New grassroots movements emerge, inspired by Halden’s vision of societal awakening and empowered civic responsibility.
